name: Bear Cubes: Merge Numbers Game
description:
Aim with your 3D cube to shoot! Merge cubes with the same number to get a higher number cube, earn diamonds and use power-ups to achieve amazing results. The challenge increases gradually with large numbered cubes, eg 1024 - 2048 - 4096 and so on.
But... be careful - the bear is watching you! 🐻
